param.name: query
query
param.value: select distinct(?uri) ?label ?starttime (concat (?lat, ",", ?long) as ?geo) where { graph ?g { ?uri <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://linkedevents.org/ontology/Event> . ?uri <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?label . ?uri <http://data.linkedevents.org/def/location#cell> ?cell . ?uri <http://linkedevents.org/ontology/atTime> ?attime . ?attime <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#hasBeginning> ?begin . ?begin <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#inXSDDateTime> ?starttime. ?uri <http://linkedevents.org/ontology/inSpace> ?space . ?space <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat . ?space <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . } filter( contains(str(?g), "http://3cixty.com/nice/") ) } LIMIT 5000
